amiller.planview
Class Planview

java.lang.Object
  java.awt.Component
      java.awt.Container
          javax.swing.JComponent
              amiller.planview.Planview
All Implemented Interfaces:
java.awt.image.ImageObserver, java.awt.MenuContainer, java.io.Serializable
public class Planview
extends javax.swing.JComponent

This class will plot objects in a cartesian plane by defining a mapping between a rectangular region in the cartesian plane and a rectangular region in descrete integer pixel space.

Version:
$Revision: $ $Modtime: $
Author:
Andrew R. Miller, Code reviewed by NOBODY on NEVER
See Also:
Serialized Form
